attributes.action: Stop the olyimpic games in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the true cost of these games being at least three times the bid price. Why don't the people who put this bid together underwrite the extra costs that they failed to inclued in the bid. If this was a private venture heads would roll and the project would be closed. This silly amount of money spent on a few overpaid "performers" with ego's the size of the world could be much better spent on heath and pensions for british people who have worked for this country all their lives

rejection.details:
There are already several petitions on this issue, please consider signing one of those, rather than starting another.
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympics
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=olympic+games
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
